message.content:
1. There were 16 patients operated by thoracotomy.
2. The 16 patients operated by thoracotomy were in the control group.
3. There were 11 patients operated by videothoracoscopy.
4. The 11 patients operated by videothoracoscopy were in the control group.

messages.content:
Statement: On the other hand 16 patients were operated by thoracotomy and 11 patients were operated by videothoracoscopy in the control group.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
